verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees אֵ֭לֶיךָ <WH413> 'E-lei-cha unto נָשָׂ֣אתִי <WH5375> na-Sa-ti Unto thee lift I up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֵינַ֑י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai; mine eyes הַ֝יֹּשְׁבִ֗י <WH3427> hai-yo-she-Vi, O thou that dwellest בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> bash-sha-Ma-yim. in the heavens

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold כְעֵינֵ֪י <WH5869> che-'ei-Nei Behold as the eyes עֲבָדִ֡ים <WH5650> 'a-va-Dim of servants אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יַ֤ד <WH3027> yad [look] unto the hand אֲ‍ ֽדוֹנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH113> ado-nei-Hem, of their masters כְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> ke-'ei-Nei [and] as the eyes שִׁפְחָה֮ <WH8198> shif-Chah of a maiden אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יַ֪ד <WH3027> yad unto the hand גְּבִ֫רְתָּ֥הּ <WH1404> ge-Vir-Tah of her mistress כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken So עֵ֭ינֵינוּ <WH5869> 'Ei-nei-nu so our eyes אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [wait] upon the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu; our God עַ֝֗ד <WH5704> 'Ad, Until שֶׁיְּחָנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH2603> shei-ye-chan-Ne-nu. until that he have mercy

חָנֵּ֣נוּ <WH2603> chan-Ne-nu Have mercy יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh upon us O LORD חָנֵּ֑נוּ <WH2603> chan-Ne-nu; have mercy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for רַ֝֗ב <WH7227> Rav, upon us for we are exceedingly שָׂבַ֥עְנוּ <WH7646> sa-Va'-nu filled בֽוּז׃ <WH937> Vuz. with contempt

רַבַּת֮ <WH7227> rab-Bat is exceedingly שָֽׂבְעָה־ <WH7646> sa-ve-'ah- filled לָּ֪הּ lah נַ֫פְשֵׁ֥נוּ <WH5315> naf-She-nu Our soul הַלַּ֥עַג <WH3933> hal-La-'ag with the scorning הַשַּׁאֲנַנִּ֑ים <WH7600> hash-sha-'a-nan-Nim; of those that are at ease הַ֝בּ֗וּז <WH937> hab-Buz, [and] with the contempt לִגְאֵ֥יוֹנִֽים׃ <WH1349> lig-'E-yo-nim of the proud
